abstractContent.text: The following paper describes the first steps in the development of an ontology for the textbook research discipline.
The aim of the project WorldViews is to establish a digital edition focussing on views of the world depicted in textbooks.
For this purpose an initial TEI profile has been formalised and tested as a use case to enable the semantical encoding of the resource 'textbook'.
This profile shall provide a basic data model describing major facets of the textbook's structure relevant to historians.
